RelatedSentence: TOKYO ( Reuters ) - Asian share prices eased on Monday while European shares were called slightly higher as investors waited to see if the world 's major central banks will continue to keep monetary policy easy and in some cases loosen further .

TOKYO ( Reuters ) - Asian share prices eased on Monday while European shares were called slightly higher as investors waited to see if the world 's major central banks will continue to keep monetary policy easy and in some cases loosen further .
